dict.acceptation: 说；讨论；说话；（用以强调款额、情况严重程度等）讲的是；
谈论；商谈；（用某种语言）讲；
说闲话；讲人坏话；嚼舌头；供出消息；

sent.orig: Normally, when you plug Macs together, they communicate by using a built-in scheme called Apple Talk.
sent.trans: 当你将Mac连在一起时，它们常常是通过所谓的内部协议Apple-Talk来进行通讯的。

sent.orig: The recipient should then type a corresponding talk command, and then the connection is established.
sent.trans: 对方应键入相应的talk命令，然后建立联系。

sent.orig: The talk command clears your screen and draws a dotted line across the middles.
sent.trans: talk命令会清屏，并在屏中间画一条点线。

sent.orig: Normally, when you plug Macs together, they communicate by using a built-in scheme called Apple-Talk.
sent.trans: 当你将Mac连在一起时，它们常常是通过称为Apple-Talk的内部协议来进行通讯的。

sent.orig: Stupid people talk about people, Average people talk about things, Intelligent people talk about ideas.
sent.trans: 愚昧的人谈论他人﹐平凡的人谈论事﹐聪明的人讨论构想。
